_meta.source: Researched from Salalah cruise port guides and Oman tourism resources

bbox_hint.note: Covers Salalah city, Al Balid, and surrounding frankincense sites

transit_routes.name: Taxi to City Center
transit_routes.note: Most convenient option. Negotiate fare before departing.

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Al Balid
transit_routes.note: UNESCO World Heritage Site near the port.

featured_experiences.name: Al Balid Archaeological Park
featured_experiences.note: Explores Salalah's role in the ancient frankincense trade. Entry ~$5.

featured_experiences.name: Wadi Darbat
featured_experiences.note: Spectacular during monsoon season (July-September). 65km from port.

featured_experiences.name: Frankincense Trail
featured_experiences.note: Visit Wadi Dawkah to see the famous frankincense groves.
